name: 華文文學英譯研究
description: In the first half of the course we will consider the history of translation of Chinese texts into western languages, as well as some of the better known translations and translators. In the second half of the course students will present in-class discussions on various translation topics.
goals: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with some of the challenges involved in translating Chinese literary texts into English.
syllabus: 課程簡介 Course Description 本學期「華文文學英譯」擬上霍克思英譯的《紅樓夢》前二十六回，期使學生了解中國古典文學英譯的問題及其解決之送。 課程簡介 Course Description 一、學生認識中國文學經典如《紅樓夢》 二、學生了解《紅樓夢》在翻譯上的困難與問題 三、學生了解經典譯者如何解決之 教學大綱 General Syllabus Tentative Schedule: 1.Introduction/ Orientation 2.Chapters 1 and 2 3.Chapters 3 and 4 4.Chapters 5 and 6 5.Chapters 7 and 8 6.Chapters 9 and 10 7.Chapters 11 and 12 8.Chapters 13 and 14 9.Chapters 15 and 16 10.Chapters 17 and 18 11.Chapter 19 12.Chapter 20 13.Chapter 21 14.Chapter 22 15.Chapter 23 16.Chapter 24 17.Chapter 25 18.Chapter 26
